Welcome to The IRIS, Inc. Website

Since 1984, The Institute for Radiological Image Sciences, Inc. has applied its extensive experience in image quality evaluation to solve the needs of medical imaging facilities. The IRIS personalized services include: system evaluations, development of purchasing specifications, acceptance testing, and quality assurance monitoring of equipment and equipment services.

The scientific reputation of the IRIS has resulted in its work providing independent testing and measurements for a variety of clients including government agencies, manufacturers and hospitals worldwide. Of note, IRIS scientests were involved with the very first presentations at RSNA Inforad.

The IRIS staff includes several senior scientists with experience in the academic, private and public sectors. This experience includes specification and acceptance testing of medical imaging equipment including CT, MRI, SPECT, SPECT/CT, PET, and PET/CT scanners. Such work was recognized by award winning presentations at meetings such as RSNA. The IRIS has tested more CT scanners than any other private group in the world.

The IRIS main office is in Myersville, MD.

Contact The IRIS via email at: info@theiris.com.
